meanings.definition: The sound of a loud engine revving.
meanings.sent1: The varoom of the motorcycle echoed through the valley.
meanings.sent2: I heard the varoom of a sports car as it sped past me.
meanings.sent3: The varoom of the lawnmower startled the sleeping cat.
meanings.sent4: The varoom of the jet taking off drowned out all other sounds.
meanings.sent5: The varoom of the race car was so loud it made my ears ring.

meanings.definition: To accelerate quickly with a loud noise.
meanings.sent1: The car will varoom down the street when the light turns green.
meanings.sent2: I watched the motorcycle varoom away into the distance.
meanings.sent3: The skateboarder tried to varoom down the hill but ended up falling.
meanings.sent4: The rocket varoomed into the sky, leaving a trail of smoke behind.
meanings.sent5: The cheetah can varoom across the savanna faster than any other animal.
